mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(SUM( lp.energy ),0) AS totalEnergy FROM dhlk_basic_tenant tenant JOIN dhlk_light_led led ON tenant.id = led.tenant_id JOIN dhlk_light_led_power lp ON led.sn = lp.led_sn WHERE DATE_FORMAT( lp.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) = date( NOW( ) ) AND tenant.id = #{tenantId}

SELECT IFNULL(SUM( lp.energy ),0) AS yesterdayEnergy FROM dhlk_basic_tenant tenant JOIN dhlk_light_led led ON tenant.id = led.tenant_id JOIN dhlk_light_led_power lp ON led.sn = lp.led_sn WHERE DATE_FORMAT( lp.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) = date_sub(curdate(),interval 1 day) AND tenant.id = #{tenantId}

SELECT IFNULL( SUM( lp.energy ), 0 ) AS energyTotal FROM dhlk_basic_tenant tenant JOIN dhlk_light_led led ON tenant.id = led.tenant_id JOIN dhlk_light_led_power lp ON led.sn = lp.led_sn WHERE tenant.id = #{tenantId}
SELECT COUNT(led.id) AS lightCount FROM dhlk_basic_tenant tenant JOIN dhlk_light_led led ON tenant.id = led.tenant_id WHERE tenant.id = #{tenantId}
SELECT led.sn from dhlk_basic_tenant tenant JOIN dhlk_light_led led ON tenant.id = led.tenant_id where tenant.id = #{tenantId}

SELECT IFNULL(SUM( lp.energy ),0) AS totalEnergy, DATE_FORMAT(lp.create_time,'%H') hours FROM dhlk_basic_tenant tenant JOIN dhlk_light_led led ON tenant.id = led.tenant_id JOIN dhlk_light_led_power lp ON led.sn = lp.led_sn WHERE DATE_FORMAT( lp.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) = CURDATE( ) and tenant.id = #{tenantId} GROUP BY hours

SELECT IFNULL(SUM( lp.energy ),0) AS totalEnergy, DATE_FORMAT(lp.create_time,'%H') hours FROM dhlk_basic_tenant tenant JOIN dhlk_light_led led ON tenant.id = led.tenant_id JOIN dhlk_light_led_power lp ON led.sn = lp.led_sn WHERE DATE_FORMAT( lp.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) = date_sub( curdate( ), INTERVAL 1 DAY ) and tenant.id = #{tenantId} GROUP BY hours

SELECT IFNULL(SUM( lp.energy ),0) AS totalEnergy, DATE_FORMAT(lp.create_time,'%d') day FROM dhlk_basic_tenant tenant JOIN dhlk_light_led led ON tenant.id = led.tenant_id JOIN dhlk_light_led_power lp ON led.sn = lp.led_sn WHERE DATE_FORMAT( lp.create_time, '%Y-%m' ) = #{date} and tenant.id = ${tenantId} GROUP BY day
SELECT led_power FROM dhlk_light_original_power where tenant_id = #{tenantId} ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT IFNULL(SUM( online_time ),0)/60 AS OnLineTimeTotal FROM dhlk_light_led_online WHERE led_sn = #{ledSn}
SELECT IFNULL(SUM( energy ),0) AS totalEnergy FROM dhlk_light_led_power WHERE led_sn = #{ledSn}
SELECT IFNULL(sum(led_power.energy),0) totalEnergy FROM dhlk_light_led led JOIN dhlk_light_led_power led_power ON led.sn = led_power.led_sn where led.tenant_id = #{tenantId}
SELECT IFNULL(sum(led_online.online_time)/60,0) totalOnlineTime FROM dhlk_light_led led JOIN dhlk_light_led_online led_online ON led.sn = led_online.led_sn where led.tenant_id = #{tenantId}
